TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HitTestResultBehavior extends System.Enum

summary.span: 确定在命中测试期间是否继续任何剩余可见对象的枚举。

span.span: Determines whether to continue the enumeration of any remaining visual objects during a hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回调方法定义命中测试时，你执行的操作的命中的测试结果中的可视化树的特定 visual 对象标识。A hit test results callback method defines the actions that you perform when a hit test is identified on a particular visual object in the visual tree. 执行操作后，返回值，该值确定是否继续任何其他视觉对象的枚举。After you perform the actions, you return a value that determines whether to continue the enumeration of any other visual objects. 可以在可视化树中枚举其几何包含特定坐标值的所有视觉对象。You can enumerate all visual objects in a visual tree whose geometry contains a specified coordinate value. 通过在你命中的测试的回调方法中返回继续，你可以识别所有视觉对象命中，甚至那些可能部分或完全遮盖的其他视觉对象。By returning Continue in your hit test callback method, you can identify all visual objects that are hit, even those that may be partly or wholly obscured by other visual objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何返回值从命中测试结果回调方法。The following example shows how to return a value from a hit test results callback method. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#102)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#102)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultBehavior Continue = int32(1)

summary.span: 继续对可视化树层次结构中的下一个可见对象进行命中测试。

span.span: Continue hit testing against the next visual in the visual tree hierarchy.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultBehavior Stop = int32(0)

summary.span: 停止任何进一步的命中测试，并从该回调返回。

span.span: Stop any further hit testing and return from the callback.
